title: Abby's Twin Bands of Gold
description: [Ménage Amour: Erotic Paranormal Ménage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, werewolves, HEA]Abby Morgan is back and her relationship with hot shifter twins, Mitch and Taylor Beaumont, is hotter than ever before. After saving her from harms way once, they soon find themselves her savior once again fighting an evil that refuses to leave them alone.After she is put in harms way a second time it puts her life and future into perspective. Things smoke between her and the twin brothers and sparks fly as a proposal is made. Will she accept what they offer her or will she run from what she's always wanted and needed in her life? Will she make the right decision or will it take some hard lovin' to make her see the light that has more than brightened her life for the past months she's spent living in the odd little town of Midnight Creek? Can she truly find her happily ever after there in a most unconventional arrangement?Note: This book is written in one point of view.A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Darlette Clarke
